name: Tickling Iris
description:
This is kind of NSFW, it contains tickling.

=======================================================

Tickling Iris : This is another short animation game I made. Iris is challenged to some tickling session.

=======================================================

Controls (for windows) :
F4 : Fullscreen
Escape : Close game
